commit.message:
Don't duplicate warning strings in GetWarnings

Since strStatusBar only ever holds the desired string, we can use it in the
strGUI construction as well.

Don't duplicate warning strings in GetWarnings

Since strStatusBar only ever holds the desired string, we can use it in the
strGUI construction as well.
